img_above_text:
![Wukong Mindcliff 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0a/Wukong_Mindcliff_21.jpg)
Among his new attacks, he can quickly launch into two slashes, and then crouch down and pivot to charge in a final dashing strike meant to chase you down if you try and dodge away -- but you can deflect this final move to stop him in his tracks.
img_below_text:
If you don't deflect, be ready for him to turn around after the charge and launch a barrage of poison daggers in your direction that are much harder to get out of the way of if you aren't ready to start strafing.
![Wukong Mindcliff 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Wukong_Mindcliff_23.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 12 from the file 'Non-White.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Mindcliff 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0a/Wukong_Mindcliff_21.jpg)
Among his new attacks, he can quickly launch into two slashes, and then crouch down and pivot to charge in a final dashing strike meant to chase you down if you try and dodge away -- but you can deflect this final move to stop him in his tracks."
            - Following Text: "If you don't deflect, be ready for him to turn around after the charge and launch a barrage of poison daggers in your direction that are much harder to get out of the way of if you aren't ready to start strafing.
![Wukong Mindcliff 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Wukong_Mindcliff_23.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the character Wukong in the midst of a combat sequence. Wukong is crouched and appears to be preparing for a dashing strike, with green poison daggers visible in the air, indicating an imminent attack. The preceding text describes Wukong's new attack moves, including a sequence of slashes followed by a dashing strike that can be deflected. The following text warns of a barrage of poison daggers if the final move is not deflected. The image serves to illustrate the gameplay mechanics and the visual effects of Wukong's attacks.
